name: Goblins
description: Goblins is a goofy strategy action game. You command the Emerald Goblin Army, attempting to avenge and defeat the Ruby Goblin Army winning the Great Gold War. Recruit special classes such as: Mages, Bombers, Barbarians, Necromancers and more. Call for precise artillery strikes to cause maximum destruction. Battle through 20 unique Campaign maps and continue your progress in Freeplay and Sandbox game modes.
